column4: im doing a resize2fs, and pass2 keeps resetting? is it normal?
Pastebin what you're seeing maybe?
I've resized2fs more times than I care to recall, but don't recall that being repeated.
its a resize from 16tb to 14tb
started 4 days ago
you know how the XXX add up?
That could take awhile, but that seems excessive.  You did a -p right?
AHh yes, the XXXs, yup.
well, i see them go to like 8, then reset to 0
over a 20-25 hours laps time
That could just be so you can see it move, since it's such a large device.  Otherwise you'd see an X, come back in three hours, not see another, and think it's stalled.
THere may be another method for determining what it's current status is.
id love to hear about it
COnsidering it's an online resize, has df changed?   Also, how full was it before resizing?
its not mounted, it had 2.4tb free space
I've got a 15TB raid6 on ext4, and it was grown drive by drive to preserve data, but it wasn't that full.  It still took >24 hours for most of the resize2fses I think.
Then it's doing a lot of shuffling around I'd bet.
growing resize is ok, shrink takes for ever
its all luks'ed
luks'ed?
is there any way to mount 2 diff FS, with the same file structur and only add/remove/move files from 1 of the fs?
mount the 2 fs in the same place
There was an overlayfs somewhere.  DUnno if it's still supported or now just in fuse.
